casebody.data:
LAKELAND NEUROCARE CENTERS, and VHS of Michigan, Inc. d/b/a The Detroit Medical Center, Plaintiffs-Appellants,
and
Jaculyn Gordon, Intervening Plaintiff,
v.
EVEREST NATIONAL INSURANCE COMPANY, Arrowhead General Insurance Agency, and NDS Insurance Agency, Inc. d/b/a Premier Insurance Agency XXV, Defendants-Appellees. SC: 157463
COA: 340346 Supreme Court of Michigan. July 27, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the February 16, 2018 order of the Court of Appeals is considered and, pursuant to MCR 7.305(H)(1), in lieu of granting leave to appeal, we REMAND this case to the Court of Appeals for consideration as on leave granted.
